name: ColecoVision Flashback
description: All the joy of the 80s in one ColecoVision® Flashback® pack! Access an impressive selection of 40 classic ColecoVision favorites, including Bump ‘n’ Jump™, Jumpman Junior™, Pepper II™, Space Panic™, Venture™, and...
minimum_requirements: OS: WinXP or newer Windows Processor: at least Intel® Pentium® M processor 1.60GHz Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: at least 1024x768 DirectX: Version 9.0
